message.content:
1. LDL-C reductions were sustained through day 85 with alirocumab plus placebo.
2. The reduction rate with alirocumab plus placebo was 47.0%.
3. The duration of effect was slightly diminished at day 85 versus day 71 with ezetimibe.
4. The reduction rate with ezetimibe was 49.6%.
5. The duration of effect was slightly diminished at day 85 versus day 71 with fenofibrate combinations.
6. The reduction rate with fenofibrate combinations was 43.2%.

messages.content:
Statement: LDL‐C reductions were sustained through day 85 with alirocumab plus placebo (47.0%); the duration of effect was slightly diminished at day 85 versus day 71 with ezetimibe (49.6%) or fenofibrate combinations (43.2%).

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
